questions.question: I eat at least 3 cups of fruits and vegetables every day.
questions.goodRemark: Maintain your intake of fruits and vegetables!
questions.focusRemark: Consider fueling your health with nature's bounty- fruits and veggies!
questions.excellentRemark: You are charging your health with fruits and veggies- go above and beyond!

questions.question: I eat at fast food restaurants less than thrice a week.
questions.goodRemark: Consider reducing your fast food intake even further for health benefits.
questions.focusRemark: Choose health, skip fast food- opt for nutritious alternatives instead.
questions.excellentRemark: Great job avoiding fast food!

questions.question: I include fibrous foods like whole grain breads, cereals, beans in my diet.
questions.goodRemark: Consider including fiber-rich foods even more for additional benefits.
questions.focusRemark: How about having fibrous foods to shield your digestive health?
questions.excellentRemark: Your gut will thank you for including fiber-rich foods in your diet.

questions.question: I avoid eating fatty foods such as whole milk, fried foods, fatty meats, etc.
questions.goodRemark: Consider avoiding fatty foods even further to keep your cholesterol low.
questions.focusRemark: Embrace health, ditch high-fat foods.
questions.excellentRemark: Great job in avoiding high-fat foods!

questions.question: I eat protein-rich foods like milk products, meat, fish, beans, etc.
questions.goodRemark: Amplify your diet's benefits with some more protein!
questions.focusRemark: Try to incorporate more protein into your daily meals.
questions.excellentRemark: Congrats on consistently fueling your body with protein!

questions.question: How many hours of sleep do you get each night?
questions.goodRemark: Your sleep patterns are average, but optimizing them can enhance your overall health.
questions.focusRemark: Prioritize sleep for better health and well-being.
questions.excellentRemark: Kudos on consistently getting ample sleep!

questions.question: How many glasses of water do you drink each day?
questions.goodRemark: Improve water intake consistency for optimal hydration.
questions.focusRemark: Alarm! Insufficient water intake risks dehydration and health problems.
questions.excellentRemark: Well done on prioritizing your hydration needs!

questions.question: I avoid the use of tobacco products (cigarettes, smokeless tobacco, cigars, and pipes) and limit myself to 5 drinks of alcohol a week. (beer, liquor, wine)
questions.goodRemark: Exercise better self-control on substance intake.
questions.focusRemark: Take charge of substance intake for improved health habits.
questions.excellentRemark: Kudos! You steer clear of tobacco and alcohol responsibly.

questions.question: Is your one-sided commute time  more than an hour ?
questions.goodRemark: Commuting an hour is considered average, allowing for a reasonable travel time.
questions.focusRemark: A long commute is time-consuming and exhausting for you.
questions.excellentRemark: Spending less than an hour commuting showcases efficient time management skills!

questions.question: How often are you addicted to online streaming services?
questions.goodRemark: Be mindful of time spent on streaming platforms.
questions.focusRemark: Beware of excessive screen usage as it can adversely affect your productivity, mental health, and overall well-being.
questions.excellentRemark: Avoiding excessive streaming fosters a healthy digital balance. Bravo!

questions.question: I engage in physical activity at least half an hour, 5 days a week.
questions.goodRemark: Your commitment to moderate physical activity outside of work is commendable.
questions.focusRemark: You must consider incorporating regular exercise for better health.
questions.excellentRemark: Congratulations on consistently engaging in moderate physical activity!

questions.question: My physical activity includes stretching, aerobic activity, and strength training.
questions.goodRemark: Well-rounded exercise routine shows dedication, improvise on prioritizing fitness.
questions.focusRemark: Embrace variety in your exercise: Stretching, aerobics, and strength training.
questions.excellentRemark: Your body will thank you for having a well-rounded approach of exercising!

questions.question: I prioritize alternative transportation- taking stairs, biking, walking whenever feasible.
questions.goodRemark: Improve your physically active commute for a healthier body.
questions.focusRemark: Choose stairs over elevators, walk instead of driving- for a healthier lifestyle.
questions.excellentRemark: Kudos for embracing physically active commuting!

questions.question: I choose physical activity over inactivity.
questions.goodRemark: Prioritizing physical activity over inactivity is a positive step forward.
questions.focusRemark: Break free from inactivity and embrace the benefits of an active lifestyle.
questions.excellentRemark: Your dedicated active lifestyle inspires others- keep it up!

questions.question: I see my physician for routine checkups, health screenings, and disease prevention.
questions.goodRemark: You can improvise in showing responsibility towards prioritizing preventive care.
questions.focusRemark: Take charge of your health- prioritize regular health checkups.
questions.excellentRemark: It's fantastic to hear that you prioritize routine checkups.

questions.question: Do you feel like you are able to speak honestly about your issues in the workplace?
questions.goodRemark: Bravo for honest communication in the workplace. Seek trusted support.
questions.focusRemark: Openness in workplace issues reduces stress. Seek support.
questions.excellentRemark: Congratulations on your ability to openly address workplace issues!

questions.question: How often do you experience stress, anxiety, or depression?
questions.goodRemark: Manage stress effectively, consider exercise, meditation, and therapy support.
questions.focusRemark: Manage stress, anxiety, and depression for well-being.
questions.excellentRemark: Impressive! Prioritizing stress management enhances overall well-being.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with the amount of control you have over the work you do?
questions.goodRemark: Satisfied with work control, seek increased autonomy and growth.
questions.focusRemark: Consider finding ways to increase your work autonomy.
questions.excellentRemark: Amazing! High work control fosters satisfaction, empowerment, and goal achievement.

questions.question: I am satisfied with the balance between my work time and leisure time.
questions.goodRemark: Prioritize your work-life balance: set boundaries, prioritize self-care for joy.
questions.focusRemark: Consider maintaining your  work-life balance which can improve your overall well-being and reduce stress.
questions.excellentRemark: Superb! You have an optimal work-life balance.

questions.question: How satisfied do you feel with the amount of quality time spent with your closed ones?
questions.goodRemark: You have a satisfactory amount of quality time with loved ones. Cherish and nurture those moments for stronger relationships. Well done!
questions.focusRemark: Prioritize quality time with loved ones for stronger bonds and lasting memories.
questions.excellentRemark: Your dedication to quality time with loved ones is commendable. Keep nurturing relationships and making cherished memories. Well done!

questions.question: How often do you meditate or practice Yoga?
questions.goodRemark: Your regular meditation or Yoga practice is commendable. It promotes relaxation, balance, and harmony. Well done!
questions.focusRemark: Practice meditation or Yoga for inner peace, mindfulness, and well-being.
questions.excellentRemark: Your commitment to meditation or Yoga is inspiring. It brings mindfulness, improved health, and self-connection. Keep it up!

questions.question: I express my feelings of anger and frustration in ways that are not hurtful to myself or others.
questions.goodRemark: Handle anger and frustration well, express without harm. Keep it up, explore more for emotional well-being. Well done!
questions.focusRemark: Express anger and frustration constructively, promoting understanding and resolution. Seek healthier outlets and effective communication strategies.
questions.excellentRemark: Your non-hurtful expression of anger and frustration shows emotional maturity and empathy. It fosters positive connections and a harmonious environment. Well done!

questions.question: I set reasonable objectives for myself and strive to accomplish them.
questions.goodRemark: Your goal-setting and determination are commendable. Keep it up for personal growth and fulfillment!
questions.focusRemark: Set realistic objectives and pursue them with determination. Unlock your potential for personal growth and success.
questions.excellentRemark: Set ambitious goals, inspire with dedication and drive. Success knows no limits. Keep going!

questions.question: I take responsibility for my actions and understand the effects they have on others.
questions.goodRemark: You're responsible and aware of your actions' impact, fostering personal growth and positive connections. Well done!
questions.focusRemark: Embrace responsibility, foster growth and positive relationships.
questions.excellentRemark: Your consistent responsibility for your actions and understanding of their impact inspire others and create positive relationships.

questions.question: I have received awards/acknowledgements in my workplace in the past 3 months.
questions.goodRemark: Congratulations on your workplace accolades! Well-deserved recognition for your outstanding efforts!
questions.focusRemark: Seek workplace awards/acknowledgements in the next 3 months. Show your dedication and excel!
questions.excellentRemark: Impressive! Your consistent workplace awards/acknowledgements highlight your unwavering commitment and inspire others.
